title: news.com.au — Australia’s #1 news site
text: October 07, 2019. Supplied video obtained Friday, October 4, 2019, of US President Donald Trump speaking to reporters outside the White House. Trumps says Ukraine and China should investigate the Bidens. "Because what happened to China is just about as bad what happened with Ukraine," he says. "I would say that president Zelensky, if it were me, I would reccommend that they start and investigation into the Bidens because nobody has any doubt that they weren't crooked. That was a crooked deal, 100 percent. He had no knowledge of energy, didn't know the first thing about it. All a sudden he's getting $50k a month, plus a lot of other things." (AAP VIDEO/Supplied/White House)
